summary: Users need a way to check the status of running workflows in the PHP SDK. This feature request asks for a `describe()` method on workflow handles to expose workflow execution status, similar to other Temporal SDKs.
userImpact: Users can now query workflow execution status directly through the PHP SDK without workarounds, improving developer experience and API consistency with other SDKs.
proposedFix: Add a `describe()` method to the workflow handle that returns workflow execution information including status, following the pattern established in TypeScript SDK.
resolutionDetails: Feature was implemented to provide describe() method on workflow handles for status queries
keyQuote: Add `describe()` method into a workflow handle like in other SDKs.
